00172 BOOLEAN EnterAimSort()
00173 {
00174   VOBJECT_DESC    VObjectDesc;
00175       UINT8                               ubCurNumber=0;
00176       UINT16                                    ubWidth;
00177       UINT8 i;
00178 
00179       AimSortCheckBoxLoc[0] = AIM_SORT_SORT_BY_X + 9;
00180       AimSortCheckBoxLoc[1] = AIM_SORT_SORT_BY_Y + 34;
00181       AimSortCheckBoxLoc[2] = AIM_SORT_SORT_BY_X + 9;
00182       AimSortCheckBoxLoc[3] = AIM_SORT_SORT_BY_Y + 47;
00183       AimSortCheckBoxLoc[4] = AIM_SORT_SORT_BY_X + 9;
00184       AimSortCheckBoxLoc[5] = AIM_SORT_SORT_BY_Y + 60;
00185       AimSortCheckBoxLoc[6] = AIM_SORT_SORT_BY_X + 111;
00186       AimSortCheckBoxLoc[7] = AIM_SORT_SORT_BY_Y + 34;
00187       AimSortCheckBoxLoc[8] = AIM_SORT_SORT_BY_X + 111;
00188       AimSortCheckBoxLoc[9] = AIM_SORT_SORT_BY_Y + 47;
00189       AimSortCheckBoxLoc[10] = AIM_SORT_SORT_BY_X + 111;
00190       AimSortCheckBoxLoc[11] = AIM_SORT_SORT_BY_Y + 60;
00191       AimSortCheckBoxLoc[12] = AIM_SORT_SORT_BY_X + 172;
00192       AimSortCheckBoxLoc[13] = AIM_SORT_SORT_BY_Y + 4;
00193       AimSortCheckBoxLoc[14] = AIM_SORT_SORT_BY_X + 172;
00194       AimSortCheckBoxLoc[15] = AIM_SORT_SORT_BY_Y + 17;
00195 
00196       //Everytime into Aim Sort, reset array.
00197       for(i=0; i<MAX_NUMBER_MERCS; i++)
00198       {
00199             AimMercArray[i] = i;
00200       }
00201 
00202       InitAimDefaults();
00203 
00204       // load the SortBy box graphic and add it
00205       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00206       FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\SortBy.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00207       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiSortByBox));
00208 
00209       // load the ToAlumni graphic and add it
00210       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00211       GetMLGFilename( VObjectDesc.ImageFile, MLG_TOALUMNI );
00212       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiToAlumni));
00213 
00214       // load the ToMugShots graphic and add it
00215       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00216       GetMLGFilename( VObjectDesc.ImageFile, MLG_TOMUGSHOTS );
00217       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiToMugShots));
00218 
00219       // load the ToStats graphic and add it
00220       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00221       GetMLGFilename( VObjectDesc.ImageFile, MLG_TOSTATS );
00222       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiToStats));
00223 
00224       // load the SelectLight graphic and add it
00225       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00226       FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\SelectLight.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00227       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiSelectLight));
00228 
00229 
00230       //** Mouse Regions **
00231 
00232       //Mouse region for the ToMugShotRegion
00233       MSYS_DefineRegion( &gSelectedToMugShotRegion, AIM_SORT_TO_MUGSHOTS_X, AIM_SORT_TO_MUGSHOTS_Y, (AIM_SORT_TO_MUGSHOTS_X + AIM_SORT_TO_MUGSHOTS_SIZE), (AIM_SORT_TO_MUGSHOTS_Y + AIM_SORT_TO_MUGSHOTS_SIZE), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00234                                            CURSOR_WWW, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, SelectToMugShotRegionCallBack ); 
00235   MSYS_AddRegion(&gSelectedToMugShotRegion); 
00236 
00237       //Mouse region for the ToStatsRegion
00238       MSYS_DefineRegion( &gSelectedToStatsRegion, AIM_SORT_TO_STATS_X, AIM_SORT_TO_STATS_Y, (AIM_SORT_TO_STATS_X + AIM_SORT_TO_STATS_SIZE), (AIM_SORT_TO_STATS_Y + AIM_SORT_TO_STATS_SIZE), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00239                                            CURSOR_WWW, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, SelectToStatsRegionCallBack ); 
00240   MSYS_AddRegion(&gSelectedToStatsRegion); 
00241 
00242       //Mouse region for the ToArhciveRegion
00243       MSYS_DefineRegion( &gSelectedToArchiveRegion, AIM_SORT_TO_ALUMNI_X, AIM_SORT_TO_ALUMNI_Y, (AIM_SORT_TO_ALUMNI_X + AIM_SORT_TO_ALUMNI_SIZE), (AIM_SORT_TO_ALUMNI_Y + AIM_SORT_TO_ALUMNI_SIZE), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00244                                            CURSOR_WWW, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, SelectToArchiveRegionCallBack ); 
00245   MSYS_AddRegion(&gSelectedToArchiveRegion); 
00246 
00247 
00248       
00249       //CURSOR_WWW MSYS_NO_CURSOR
00250       ubCurNumber = 0;
00251       //Mouse region for the Price Check Box
00252       ubWidth = StringPixLength( AimSortText[PRICE], AIM_SORT_FONT_SORT_TEXT) + AimSortCheckBoxLoc[ ubCurNumber ] + (AIM_SORT_PRICE_TEXT_X - AimSortCheckBoxLoc[ ubCurNumber ]) - 3;
00253       MSYS_DefineRegion( &gSelectedPriceBoxRegion, AimSortCheckBoxLoc[ ubCurNumber ] , AimSortCheckBoxLoc[ubCurNumber + 1] , (UINT16)ubWidth, (UINT16)(AimSortCheckBoxLoc[ ubCurNumber + 1 ] + AIM_SORT_CHECKBOX_SIZE), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00254                                            MSYS_NO_CURSOR, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, SelectPriceBoxRegionCallBack ); 
00255   MSYS_AddRegion(&gSelectedPriceBoxRegion); 
00256 
00257       ubCurNumber+=2;
00258       ubWidth = StringPixLength( AimSortText[EXPERIENCE], AIM_SORT_FONT_SORT_TEXT) + AimSortCheckBoxLoc[ ubCurNumber ] + (AIM_SORT_PRICE_TEXT_X - AimSortCheckBoxLoc[ ubCurNumber ]) - 3;
00259       //Mouse region for the Experience Check Box
00260       MSYS_DefineRegion( &gSelectedExpBoxRegion, AimSortCheckBoxLoc[ ubCurNumber ] , AimSortCheckBoxLoc[ubCurNumber + 1] , (UINT16)ubWidth, (UINT16)(AimSortCheckBoxLoc[ ubCurNumber + 1 ] + AIM_SORT_CHECKBOX_SIZE), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00261                                            MSYS_NO_CURSOR, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, SelectExpBoxRegionCallBack ); 
00262   MSYS_AddRegion(&gSelectedExpBoxRegion); 
00263       
00264       ubCurNumber+=2;
00265       ubWidth = StringPixLength( AimSortText[AIMMARKSMANSHIP], AIM_SORT_FONT_SORT_TEXT) + AimSortCheckBoxLoc[ ubCurNumber ] + (AIM_SORT_PRICE_TEXT_X - AimSortCheckBoxLoc[ ubCurNumber ]) - 3;
00266       //Mouse region for the Markmanship Check Box
00267       MSYS_DefineRegion( &gSelectedMarkBoxRegion, AimSortCheckBoxLoc[ ubCurNumber ] , AimSortCheckBoxLoc[ubCurNumber + 1] , (UINT16)ubWidth, (UINT16)(AimSortCheckBoxLoc[ ubCurNumber + 1 ] + AIM_SORT_CHECKBOX_SIZE), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00268                                            MSYS_NO_CURSOR, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, SelectMarkBoxRegionCallBack ); 
00269   MSYS_AddRegion(&gSelectedMarkBoxRegion); 
00270       
00271       ubCurNumber+=2;
00272       ubWidth = StringPixLength( AimSortText[AIMMEDICAL], AIM_SORT_FONT_SORT_TEXT) + AimSortCheckBoxLoc[ ubCurNumber ] + (AIM_SORT_MEDICAL_X - AimSortCheckBoxLoc[ ubCurNumber ]) - 3;
00273       //Mouse region for the Medical  Check Box
00274       MSYS_DefineRegion( &gSelectedMedicalBoxRegion, AimSortCheckBoxLoc[ ubCurNumber ] , AimSortCheckBoxLoc[ubCurNumber + 1] , (UINT16)ubWidth, (UINT16)(AimSortCheckBoxLoc[ ubCurNumber + 1 ] + AIM_SORT_CHECKBOX_SIZE), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,

00276   MSYS_AddRegion(&gSelectedMedicalBoxRegion); 
00277 
00278       ubCurNumber+=2;

00280       //Mouse region for the Explosive  Check Box
00281       MSYS_DefineRegion( &gSelectedExplosiveBoxRegion, AimSortCheckBoxLoc[ ubCurNumber ] , AimSortCheckBoxLoc[ubCurNumber + 1] , (UINT16)ubWidth, (UINT16)(AimSortCheckBoxLoc[ ubCurNumber + 1 ] + AIM_SORT_CHECKBOX_SIZE), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,

00290   MSYS_AddRegion(&gSelectedMechanicalBoxRegion); 
00291 
00292 
00293       ubCurNumber+=2;
00294 
00295       ubWidth = AimSortCheckBoxLoc[ ubCurNumber ] - StringPixLength( AimSortText[ASCENDING], AIM_SORT_FONT_SORT_TEXT) - 6;
00296       //Mouse region for the Ascend Check Box
00297       MSYS_DefineRegion( &gSelectedAscendBoxRegion, ubWidth , AimSortCheckBoxLoc[ubCurNumber + 1] , (UINT16)(AimSortCheckBoxLoc[ ubCurNumber ] + AIM_SORT_CHECKBOX_SIZE), (UINT16)(AimSortCheckBoxLoc[ ubCurNumber + 1 ] + AIM_SORT_CHECKBOX_SIZE), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00298                                            MSYS_NO_CURSOR, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, SelectAscendBoxRegionCallBack ); 
00299   MSYS_AddRegion(&gSelectedAscendBoxRegion); 
00300 
00301       ubCurNumber+=2;
00302       ubWidth = AimSortCheckBoxLoc[ ubCurNumber ] - StringPixLength( AimSortText[DESCENDING], AIM_SORT_FONT_SORT_TEXT) - 6;
00303 
00304       //Mouse region for the Descend Check Box
00305       MSYS_DefineRegion( &gSelectedDescendBoxRegion, ubWidth, AimSortCheckBoxLoc[ubCurNumber + 1] , (UINT16)(AimSortCheckBoxLoc[ ubCurNumber ] + AIM_SORT_CHECKBOX_SIZE), (UINT16)(AimSortCheckBoxLoc[ ubCurNumber + 1 ] + AIM_SORT_CHECKBOX_SIZE), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,

00308 
00309 
00310       InitAimMenuBar();
00311 
00312       
00313       RenderAimSort();
00314 
00315       return( TRUE );
00316 }
00317 
00318 void ExitAimSort()
00319 {
00320       // Sort the merc array
00321       SortMercArray();
00322       RemoveAimDefaults();
00323 
00324       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiSortByBox);
00325       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiToAlumni);
00326       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiToMugShots);
00327       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiToStats);
00328       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiSelectLight);
00329 
00330   MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gSelectedToMugShotRegion);
00331   MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gSelectedToStatsRegion);
00332   MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gSelectedToArchiveRegion);
00333 
00334   MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gSelectedPriceBoxRegion);
00335   MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gSelectedExpBoxRegion);
00336   MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gSelectedMarkBoxRegion);
00337   MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gSelectedMedicalBoxRegion);
00338   MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gSelectedExplosiveBoxRegion);
00339   MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gSelectedMechanicalBoxRegion);
00340   MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gSelectedAscendBoxRegion);
00341   MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gSelectedDescendBoxRegion);
00342       ExitAimMenuBar();
00343 
00344 }

00350 
00351 void RenderAimSort()
00352 {
00353   HVOBJECT  hSortByHandle;
00354   HVOBJECT  hToAlumniHandle;
00355   HVOBJECT  hToMugShotHandle;
00356   HVOBJECT  hToStatsHandle;
00357 
00358       DrawAimDefaults();
00359       // SortBy
00360       GetVideoObject(&hSortByHandle, guiSortByBox);
00361   BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hSortByHandle, 0,AIM_SORT_SORT_BY_X, AIM_SORT_SORT_BY_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00362 
00363       // To MugShots
00364       GetVideoObject(&hToMugShotHandle, guiToMugShots);
00365   BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hToMugShotHandle, 0,AIM_SORT_TO_MUGSHOTS_X, AIM_SORT_TO_MUGSHOTS_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00366 
00367       // To stats
00368       GetVideoObject(&hToStatsHandle, guiToStats);
00369   BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hToStatsHandle, 0,AIM_SORT_TO_STATS_X, AIM_SORT_TO_STATS_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00370 
00371       // To Alumni
00372       GetVideoObject(&hToAlumniHandle, guiToAlumni);
00373   BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hToAlumniHandle, 0,AIM_SORT_TO_ALUMNI_X, AIM_SORT_TO_ALUMNI_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00374 
00375 
00376       // Draw the aim slogan under the symbol
00377       DisplayAimSlogan();
00378 
00379       //Display AIM Member text
00380       DrawTextToScreen(AimSortText[AIM_AIMMEMBERS], AIM_SORT_AIM_MEMBER_X, AIM_SORT_AIM_MEMBER_Y, AIM_SORT_AIM_MEMBER_WIDTH, AIM_MAINTITLE_FONT, AIM_MAINTITLE_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED  );
00381 
00382       //Display sort title
00383       DrawTextToScreen(AimSortText[SORT_BY], AIM_SORT_SORT_BY_TEXT_X, AIM_SORT_SORT_BY_TEXT_Y, 0, AIM_SORT_FONT_TITLE, AIM_SORT_SORT_BY_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED   );
00384 
00385       //Display all the sort by text

00649 
00650 void DrawSelectLight(UINT8 ubMode, UINT8 ubImage)
00651 {
00652       HVOBJECT    hSelectLightHandle;
00653 
00654       ubMode *= 2;
00655 
00656       GetVideoObject(&hSelectLightHandle, guiSelectLight);
00657   BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hSelectLightHandle, ubImage, (AimSortCheckBoxLoc[ubMode] ), ( AimSortCheckBoxLoc[ubMode + 1] ), VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00658 
00659 //  InvalidateRegion(LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X,LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y,LAPTOP_SCREEN_LR_X,LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_LR_Y);
00660 
00661   InvalidateRegion(AimSortCheckBoxLoc[ubMode],AimSortCheckBoxLoc[ubMode+1], (AimSortCheckBoxLoc[ubMode] + AIM_SORT_CHECKBOX_SIZE), (AimSortCheckBoxLoc[ubMode+1] + AIM_SORT_CHECKBOX_SIZE) );
00662 }

00665 
00666 
00667 
00668 BOOLEAN SortMercArray(void)
00669 {
00670       qsort( (LPVOID)AimMercArray, (size_t) MAX_NUMBER_MERCS, sizeof(UINT8), QsortCompare);
00671 
00672       return(TRUE);
00673 }
00674 
00675 
00676 
00677 
00678 INT32 QsortCompare( const void *pNum1, const void *pNum2)
00679 {
00680       UINT8 Num1 = *(UINT8*)pNum1;
00681       UINT8 Num2 = *(UINT8*)pNum2;
00682 
00683       switch( gubCurrentSortMode )
00684       {
00685             //Price                                   INT16 uiWeeklySalary
00686             case 0:
00687                   return( CompareValue((INT32)gMercProfiles[ Num1 ].uiWeeklySalary,  (INT32)gMercProfiles[Num2].uiWeeklySalary ) );
00688                   break;
00689             //Experience                  INT16 bExpLevel
00690             case 1:
00691                   return( CompareValue((INT32)gMercProfiles[ Num1 ].bExpLevel,  (INT32)gMercProfiles[Num2].bExpLevel) );
00692                   break;
00693             //Marksmanship          INT16 bMarksmanship
00694             case 2:
00695                   return( CompareValue((INT32)gMercProfiles[ Num1 ].bMarksmanship,  (INT32)gMercProfiles[Num2].bMarksmanship ) );
00696                   break;
00697             //Medical                           INT16 bMedical
00698             case 3:
00699                   return( CompareValue((INT32)gMercProfiles[ Num1 ].bMedical,  (INT32)gMercProfiles[Num2].bMedical ) );
00700                   break;
00701             //Explosives                  INT16 bExplosive
00702             case 4:
00703                   return( CompareValue((INT32)gMercProfiles[ Num1 ].bExplosive,  (INT32)gMercProfiles[Num2].bExplosive ) );
00704                   break;
00705             //Mechanical                  INT16 bMechanical
00706             case 5:
00707                   return( CompareValue((INT32)gMercProfiles[ Num1 ].bMechanical,  (INT32)gMercProfiles[Num2].bMechanical ) );
00708                   break;
00709 
00710             default:
00711                   Assert( 0 );
00712                   return( 0 );
00713                   break;
00714       }
00715 }
00716 
00717 
00718 
00719 
00720 INT32 CompareValue(const INT32 Num1, const INT32 Num2)
00721 {
00722       // Ascending
00723       if( gubCurrentListMode == AIM_ASCEND)
00724       {
00725             if( Num1 < Num2)
00726                   return(-1);
00727             else if( Num1 == Num2)
00728                   return(0);
00729             else
00730                   return(1);
00731       }
00732 
00733       // Descending
00734       else if( gubCurrentListMode == AIM_DESCEND )
00735       {
00736             if( Num1 > Num2)
00737                   return(-1);
00738             else if( Num1 == Num2)
00739                   return(0);
00740             else
00741                   return(1);
00742       }
00743 
00744       return( 0 );
00745 }
